Reviews.Title: Good model if we still live in 2008!
Reviews.Author: arqrc
Reviews.Content: So im not  a BB fan, therefore Im not current at BB models. I just wanted a nice phone for my GF and when she saw it in this white model she fall in love with it. so we bought it.Now the bad:- This phone is very old!!! the installed OS is not even supported by BlacBerry anymore!!- The keyboard is just a nigthmare to use! 2 letters for each button is impossible to use!- No optical scroll- No support for BB App worldThe only cool thing about this phone is the led flash (altough not good at all) and the white bezel.Not worted the money!!ESPAÑOLResumiendo lo que puse arriba es un telefono sumanmente antiguo, sin saber de blackberry cometi el error de comprarlo basandome solo en la puntuacion sin darme cuenta que es un modelo ya descontinuado al que no se le puede instalar ninguna aplicacion nueva.No vale el dinero que piden por el.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Peter Matyko
Reviews.Content: Good phone, works well.  We use it as a phone only.  Keys are a little small (like most newer phones).  The keyboard is hard to figure out if trying to dial a number from words.  Still have not figured out how to translate words to numbers on this keyboard.  But the phone otherwise is good.

Reviews.Title: I love blackberry pearl!
Reviews.Author: aryas83
Reviews.Content: I'm just kind of in love with the Blackberry pearl, I got my first one in 2007 and since then broke about 5 of them, in fights and stuff lol :) Or thorwing it at the wall in some situations! But I always ordered another one, so this is the best one I've had so far, I like this cause its a small smart phone, and this one actually has WiFi, Video Recorder and a slot for memory card so I use it to listen to a lot of music as I work out to keep stress away and dont break this one too! :)  So its quite multifunctional and you can still use WiFi without an active SIM card, and plus it's unlocked.So yeah I recommend it, cause I just like this blackberry, the color white is very stylish, and soft to the touch, great fit in your hands, its not wide and big like the curve or iphone, and well I just love 'em!
